blocks.name: rmsupp0
blocks.content: The support of a mapping of a multiplication of zero with a function into a ring is empty. (Contributed by AV, 10-Apr-2019.)

blocks.name: rmsuppss
blocks.content: The support of a mapping of a multiplication of a constant with a function into a ring is a subset of the support of the function. (Contributed by AV, 11-Apr-2019.)

blocks.name: scmsuppss
blocks.content: The support of a mapping of a scalar multiplication with a function of scalars is a subset of the support of the function of scalars. (Contributed by AV, 5-Apr-2019.)
